channel.title: I bought a box of condoms today
channel.description:
yes sir, i walked into that store, as nervouse as a kid buying a porn mag, and walked out a man, i walks in, has a look around, make sure no1 is lookin and quikly throw the rubbers in my basket, then throw in some house hold goods, like im doin my moms shopping, baby oil, lotion, tissue, etc, then get it line, and make sure the counter isnt mounted by an attractive chick, i hide the rubbers so the old bitch behind doesnt see em, she processes the goods, and i run out!
there cool, like ballons, exept higher burst level, i shall keep them in my drawer, they will be used one day, maybe not tommorow, maybe not next week, but they will be used...

item.title: I bought a box of condoms today
item.dc:creator: @anon95490785
item.description:
@anon95490785 wrote:

Our school hands out free LifeStyle condoms, most highschools give out free condoms to promote safe sex. When I need a condom(No I am not some 11 year old bragging about sex I am a girl and they are good to keep for when you need them) I just go to the health room and fill out a form and they’ll hand me 5 condoms, and you can go back and get more whenever you need them.
